column3: Okay, she is the star of the play
I get to have sex with the star of the play
That is one good looking man
Is it just me, or can you actually see his abs through his overcoat
Sooo, you’ve been doing this long
Put the money on the table
If you want it to be
Oh, hey, Mon, do you still have your like old blouses and dresses from high school
Yeah, I think I have some around here somewhere
Well, it’s just that maternity clothes are so expensive
I made a pile of your stuff over on this side of the room
If you could just……throw your purses at it
Oh my God, are you out of a job
No, but they stuck me in personal shopping
Which is just a huge step down
Like where you walk around with snooty rich people and tell them what to buy
Umm, excuse me, we switched apartments
You can’t eat are food anymore, that-that gravy train had ended
If you have the big apartment you have to deal with people coming over all the time
That fridge has got to be stocked, okay, that’s your department now
I think I left a donut up here
Well, Kathy gets half-naked and simulates sex with a real good lookin’ guy
Yeah, it’s like someone literally wrote down my worst nightmare and then charged me $32 to see it
That’s a good idea for a business
Okay, they are gonna be hot and heavy on stage every night, and then they’re gonna go to their cast parties and he’s gonna try to undermine me
Y'know it’ll be like, "So where’s your boyfriend, what’s-his-name, Chester
All right, look, look, what am I gonna do
They’re there to do a job, just ‘cause they work together, doesn’t mean they’re gonna get together
I mean just ‘cause it happened with Susan Sarandon and Tim Robbins, it doesn’t mean it’s gonna happen with them
Oh-oh, Alec Baldwin and Kim Basinger
Hey, Mel Gibson and Clint Eastwood
Oh-okay, I get the game now
Okay look, look, let me ask you a question, when they were doing it on stage, was it like really hot
Well okay, so then you’re fine
The rule is when two actors are actually doing it off-stage all the sexual tension between them is gone
So as long as it’s hot onstage you got nothing to worry about
It’s when the heat goes away, that’s when you’re in trouble
Look, you guys have been to every play I’ve ever been in, have I ever had chemistry on stage
So uh, man, are you gonna go to the play with me tonight
Y’know what, I don’t know how comfortable I am going to see how hot the sex is between some guy and your girlfriend
Okay, okay, but don’t worry, because we also have cereals, muffins, waffles, and, jams, jellies, and marmalades
Which I’m fairly certain are the same thing
Listen also we’re uh, we’re watching the game here Saturday night, if people want to come over
Oh, I was thinking about having people over for the game
Somebody seems to be missing being the hostess
Please, it’s a relief is what it is, is what it is
All right Pheebs, stick out your plate
I just helped an 81 year old woman put on a thong and she didn’t even buy it
I’m talking to my boss right now
Okay bye, call me when you get this message
Waltham, I ah really need to talk to you
In a moment, please, I’m in the middle of a task
What can I do for you Joshua
Well, I need a whole new wardrobe
Anyway, she burned all of my clothes
I got away with two things
This suit and what turned out to be a skirt
Well, at least that’s a great suit
Yeah, but it wasn’t much fun dropping it off at the dry cleaners in the skirt
So I need everything down to underwear, so if you’re willing, I’m all yours
Rachel, you needed to speak to me
Let me show you my underwear
The selection of underwear we carry
Oh-oh, sorry, it’s this way, it’s this way
There was like no chemistry between them
Before they had heat, and now there’s no heat
Now you know what this means, Joey told us what this means
All right, let’s not jump to any conclusions
There was some sexual chemistry between them
Come on, it was like cousins having sex up there
Just be cool, don’t be…y'know you
Thank you so much for coming again
Wasn’t Nick funny when he couldn’t get his match lit
It’s a good play, isn’t it
You were great, and Nick ditto
Clearly you’re having sex with him
Clearly, I’m having sex with him
Oh come on, it was so obvious
There was no chemistry between you two
Okay, so let me just get this straight
You’re accusing me of cheating on you, and insulting my performance
Y’know, I-I could see how this could happen, y'know you’re up there every night, you’re naked, touching, kissing
I’m-I’m playing a part in a play
How can you not trust me
Well, you can understand, given how we started
I can’t believe you’re throwing that in my face
Well, that is what happened, and I don’t even see you denying this
I’ll tell you what, Chandler, why don’t you call me when you grow up
Yeah, well, don’t expect that to happen anytime soon
I have the best job in the entire world
The most adorable guy came over today, and I got to dress him up all day
Oh, I wish he was a doll, then I could get a Rachel doll and bump them together and make kissy noises
And he has the most beautiful name, I never realised it, Joshua
I don’t know, it smells good
Yeah, I’ve just been fiddling around in here making delicious treats for everyone
Yeah, it’s just something I picked up
Cookies and porn, you’re the best mom ever
Well, it was just something Josh said about v-necks, but you had to be there
Yeah, how does Jason look in a v-neck
Well, I hate to eat and run, but…
I’ve got porn for you too
People are supposed to wanna hang out here
Honey, what is the big deal
I mean, I was always the hostess, I mean even when I was little, I mean the girls brought their dollies to my tea party, I-I served the best air
Well, why did you make like a whole big thing out of y'know, everyone has to hang out in the big apartment
‘Cause they took our apartment, I wanted to punish them
If you wanted to punish them, you should’ve just made them hang out here
All right then, when I’m done with this place, it’s gonna be ten times better than that place
Oh, are we gonna trash that place
You will all be very happy to hear that Kathy is sleeping with that guy
I confronted her, and she didn’t deny it
Well, I may be drunk, but I know what she said
Then I went over to Beefsteak Julie’s…
See you and I have always been like—
Oh, hey, do you need help with that
Ooh, I just feel bad, I never vacuum
So I was with Joshua for an hour today, and he has not asked me out
Why don’t you ask him out
He just got a divorce right
So he’s probably really nervous around women, y'know
Maybe, you just have to make the first move
Yeah but, I’ve never asked a guy out before
You’ve never asked a guy out
That doesn’t make me sound too good does it
I don’t even know how I would go about it
Oh-oh-oh-oh, how I do it is, I look a woman up and down and say, "Hey, how you doin’
You know what, I’m gonna do that, I’m gonna call him up, and I’m gonna ask him out
Yeah, umm, I was wondering if you umm, if you umm, left your wallet at the store today
Well, we found a wallet, and we— the license
Well, that is a good idea
Uh, well, let’s see here this says this license belongs to a uh, uh, belongs to a mister uh, Pheebs, and umm, yeah, so sorry to bother you at home
You’ve done that a thousand times
Ohh, God, I just got so nervous that he would say no
Well, you gotta give him something that he can’t say no too
Invite the guy to a Knicks game, you’re guaranteed he’ll say yes
And if it doesn’t, can I get the extra ticket
All right, maybe I should call her
You don’t need her, you don’t need that
He’s right, what she did was unforgivable
Well, yeah, but y'know, what-what if I was wrong
Well y'know, what if she didn’t actually sleep with the guy
Dude, tell me she actually told you this
She did not have to tell me, I saw the play, and there was no heat
That’s all you’re basing this on
Look, you said with the off-stage and the heat, and the onstage and the oy heat
Whoa-whoa, that-that was just a theory
There’s a lot of theories that didn’t pan out
Would you like to go to a basketball game with me
You know, its funny, basketball, because I happen to have tickets too…  Umm, who likes the Knicks—
Well, as a single woman, who is available, I think you look great
In fact, I think I’m gonna wear it home
All right, thank you so much for all your help
Well, I guess this is uh, I guess this is it
Maybe I’ll see in the spring, with the uh, y’know, for the uh, bathing suits
Oh well, you don’t want to do that now
Anyway, hopefully, I’ll see you around sometime
I uh, I have two tickets to the Knicks game tonight if you’re interested, just as a thank you for this week
My-my nephew is crazy about the Knicks
This is fantastic, thank you so much Rachel
I just, I just wanted to come over to-to say that I’m sorry
I know I acted like the biggest idiot in the world, and I can completely understand why you were so upset
I really wish you’d call me
Yeah, I know, I-I wish I had too, but y’know I-I think this is a good thing
‘Cause we’ve had our first fight, and now we can move on
Y’know, I know for me— Nick’s pants
Well, I think our second fight is going to be a big one
Okay, for next time, what do you say
Not, two tickets, I have an extra ticket
So the first time you ask a guy out, he-he turns you down
He’s at the game isn’t he
I got the date, I’m just not on it
Oh did you—what did you—did you work for two days straight
So, what do you, what do you think of the floor
I don’t know, it looks the same
I’m just gonna rest my eyes just a little bit
Look, Mon, do you want us to uh, come back later
Oh no-no-no, stay, stay, stay, just keep talking
Well, she wasn’t sleeping with him
I’m saying that she… is a devil woman
Y’know I mean you think you know someone and then they turn around and they sleep with Nick
Nick, with his rock hard pecs, and his giant man-nipples
I hate him, I hate her
Well, I don’t hate her, I love her
This is all my fault really
Y’know if I had just called her after our big, stupid fight, she never would’ve gone out with Nick, and they would’ve ended up in bed together
I threw her at his man nipples
Honey, this is not your fault, just because you guys had a fight, it does not justify her sleeping with someone
Well, if-if she thought they were on a break…
Rachel, one of your customers seems to have left his billfold
I left my wallet here on purpose
Yes, I just wanted to see you again
Rachel, I’d like to say something to you
